page.title: 15The Melling Chronicle
page.content: Our village has a monthly news sheet that is delivered to all homes. JUNE 1985 MELLING CHRONICLE VOL.10 NO.6 5 Wed. Mothers'Union outing and A.G.M 6 Thur. " " Deanery Festival 16 Sun. Countryside Society Ramble 2pm. 20 Thur. W.I. Outing to Churchtown. 26 Wed. W.I. Programme Meeting 7.30pm ***** The Parish Communion 16 June 9-45am ----- Melling Rite B 23 " 11-45am ----- Tatham - 1662 ***** Cricket Match Sun 7 July 2pm. Melling v Arkholme Bring all the family,plus picnic tea to Hornby school playing field. ***** Mothers Union. Members had a discussion on problems faced by young people and the position of women in the church. Churchyard.Any volunteers to cut grass?
